Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
The Board class is an integral part of the game system as it creates and assigns indexes to all the nodes.

    • resetBoard

      public void resetBoard()
      Reset the board's node triplet. This method is called when the user decided to perform a rematch.

    • isMillExists

      public boolean isMillExists​(Node node, Player player)
      Verify if mill exists
      Parameters:
      node - current node to checked
      player - current player to perform the command
      Returns:
      true if mill exists, else false

    • hasRemovableToken

      public boolean hasRemovableToken​(Player currentPlayer)
      Determine if a player can remove any tokens from the opponent, there might be a possibility where all of them are in mill.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - current player to perform the command
      Returns:
      true if has removable token, else false
